statement: Start silly, send the system back the max priced product for the given input products.You 'GET' the input from http://host:port/challenge/input and then 'POST' the answer to http://host:port/challenges/output. The request for input and output should not be more than 2 secs
sampleInput: Input will be a json of the format eg:{ input: [{ productName:"Kindle Paperwhite",  price: 5345.00, currency: "INR" }, { productName:"iPad Tablet",  price: 24900.00, currency: "INR" }, { productName:"Microsoft Surface Pro 4",  price: 87299.00, currency: "INR" } ]} you need to post max priced product like {output:{ productName:"iPad Tablet",  price: 24900.00, currency: "INR" }}

input.name: Coolpad Note 5 Lite (Space Grey, 3GB RAM + 16 GB)
